name: ZZ's MiniBrief10-Mr.President
description:
• No offense to any country or individual.
  • Does not represent any political position of the author.
  • Have used some network assets, please contact me if there is any infringement.

This is a prototype of Political game, short and has some bugs.  A bit like Reigns. 

I hope players can play the role of president, and understand the purpose of some political means and the difficulty of leading the country by dealing with state affairs and the reaction of society and the people.
